title: Hello, dear. Please tell me where can I buy the back glass panel on your wonderful google pixel 3
content: Hello, dear. Please tell me where can I buy the back glass panel on your wonderful google pixel 3 smartphone? a friend dropped it and broke the lid. I'm from Russia. There is no panel in services. on the sites there. the question is, where can I buy it?!?!?! I am writing to you through the translator
